overview: Join Sean Mooney for a look at some of the most fast-paced and hard-hitting action to ever take place inside in the squared circle. From The Texas Tornado going one-on-one with "The Model" Rick Martel to The Ultimate Warrior defending the WWE Championship against Ted DiBiase, this special presentation offers a litany of exciting in-ring battles.
tagline: Feel the impact of WWF's Greatest Hits!
title: WWF Greatest Hits
